  She walked up=
 to the CR chamber panel and  turned off the power to 
  the chamber.  She =
knew that by cutting the power, it would put the 
  bot inside into stasis =
lock.  She smiled and waited.

ark::

acked into the CR

 he didn't

 After that was done his Optics returned to the normal blue and

them, he fell asleep quickly after. He wouldn't be awake

t a smile

hamber.

Power levels kinda

She got out of the CR chamber and walked to her work bench.  
  She 
  >   =

  >   boa=
rd 
  >   >   for her chips.  She had one in HotRod, one in Battera.  She 
=
  had 
  >   only 
  >   >   one chip left to install.  She picked up the c=
hip and put in 
  her 
  >   arm 
  >   >   with the panel.  She then close=
d her arm panel and smiled.  
  She 
  >   could 
  >   >   now control the=
 other bots and not lose the controls.  She

ng on a plan to get HotRod and Battera over to Zardus.  
  She

e to the lab please?"

"

ip

 felt a surge of information flood her mind. She fell to

d

 =
 She 
  >   >   looked at Feline. "What is it that you want?" she said in a=
 
  >   rather 
  >   >   rough voice.

  >   > =

  into 
  >   =
>   Battera's ear,"I want you to go to the Allience base and tell 
  >   Za=
rdus 
  >   >   that you now serve him and that I will be going back to the=
 
  base 
  >   >   soon. You are to follow and obey Zardus now. Got it?"
 =
 >   >

  >   >   She smiled evilly and looked at Felin=
e, "Yes, right away."
  >   >   She then walked out of the lab.  She headed=
 to the entrance 
  and 
  >   >   stepped outside of the base.  She transf=
ormed into her bat 
  mode 
  >   and 
  >   >   took off towards the sky. =
 She had the distict feeling like 
  she 
  >   was 
  >   >   finally find=
ing her place.

he bot from maximal

om good natured to
